ygData.subject: Re: lindel
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL so did I.  As a matter of fact I got a bunch of people from my guild and we all got enduring breath and we scoured every inch of that water and didn t come
ygData.messageBody:
LOL so did I. As a matter of fact I got a bunch of people from my guild and
we all got enduring breath and we scoured every inch of that water and
didn't come up with anything! :( Though we all mastered swimming. (I'm at
116 now) It was kinda fun actually. Beats sitting and waiting for the the
next spawn to hack and slash. I just hope it's not down in that kedge keep
place. But why on earth would they put information to find such basic
tinering knowledge on how to make a fishing pole in such a dangerous place
like that. I mean the book of wu (contains tailoring info for the hard to
make cured silk and stuff) can be found on a lvl 20 orc in lesser feydark.
That thing is simple to get. Does anyone else know of any other trade books
that are gotten off a monster or some other way other then buying off a
merchant?

One thing I did find was a swimming guide! heh never saw that before.
There was a Guide V swimming around down there around the king's palace.
Hailed her, but just gave the standard guide response.

I couldn't find any coin. Where exactly is that at?

---
gr0k - Stranger in a Strange Land - http://www.juju.org
"Linux... find out what you've been missing while
you've been rebooting Windows NT" - Infoworld

Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] lindel


> From: Zach Heaven <zheaven@...>
>
> Heh.
>
> That hole is huge. If you swim down far enough you hit... NOTHING! I
even
> scraped the walls to see if I could find a secret room, nothing. Anywho.
I
> scanned all of Ak'anon today underwater (145 swimming currently). Didn't
see
> anything cool to note. Scanned for about an hour or so. Was a waste of
time I
> think.
